content: get your daily dose of happiness with these cheerful crochet slippers stitched in red heart super saver stripes the pattern cleverly transforms a granny hexagon into a slipper made in 1 piece and seamed at the back and bottom you ll also shape the toe and finish the top edge this fun pattern includes chain double_crochet working in rounds and working in row techniques watch the colors appear before your eyes in a project that s pure joy to do and to wear materials red heart® super saver® stripes™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m sizes s m l retro stripes 4971 1 1 1 ball sizes to fit adult shoe size 5/6 7/8 9/10 finished foot length s 5/6 9 23 cm m 7/8 9½ 24 cm l 9/10 10½ 26 5 cm
